short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create tasks based on a selected list on your Azure DevOps splint board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create tasks automatically on Azure DevOps based on a list that you have selected.

You can use this tool to help you add Tasks to your User Story based on a list of items that you want to have. This solves an annoying problem that is create tasks manually even if you already have a list of with what to do inside your user story.

• • •

How to use it?
• Define your Personal Access Token on the options page of the extension
• Select a list with the tasks that you want to create and click on `Create Tasks`, the extension will automatically create the tasks for you and attach it to the current User Story. 
• It will also set the some information, like the iteration, to match with the parent story. 

• • •

Suggestions or feedback? Feel free to send me an email.


*** Release Notes ***

1.2 
    - Fix bug were Create Task button does not work 
    - Hide pathToken under configuration, so it acts as a password
